SummaryOfDirectCharitableActy.Description1: The Hope Center Foundation operates as a place for Christian ministries to use in religious worship, education, and fellowship. The building is 187,000 square feet and was completed in the fall of 2009. It leases space to 501(c)(3) Christian organizations and is at full capacity. The first tenant began use in October 2009, and all other tenants were in by December 2009. These organizations engage in acts of service and worship in conjunction with Christian ministries committed to carrying out the Great Commission of Jesus Christ.

ContributorAddressUS.AddressLine1: c/o Bank of America PO Box 831041
